description: The decaying and crumbling remains of the old mill stand as a dark testament to the evil that has consumed this place. The air is thick with an oppressive malaise, and the sound of creaking timbers and scurrying vermin only heightens the sense of unease. You can feel the weight of some unseen presence watching your every move, and the hairs on the back of your neck stand on end.

actions.name: Search area
actions.description: You search the area, but find nothing of value - the mill has been thoroughly ransacked and stripped bare.
